Column.Name: Current Contract Value
Column.Formula:
IF( [Status] = "Approved", [Current Contract Value],
[Total Contract Value] )

Column.Name: New Contract Value
Column.Formula: [Original Contract Value] + [Previous Variations to Date] + [Variation Value]

Column.Name: Is System User
Column.Formula: EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Everyone" )

Column.Name: User is Vendor
Column.Formula: EBMS_IS_USER_IN_ROLE( EBMS_GET_CURRENT_USER(), "Vendor Accounts" )

Column.Name: Count of Extensions
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LENGTH(EACH [AutoExtend])

Column.Name: End Date
Column.Formula: IF( [Status] = "Approved", [End Date], HASH_GET([Contract Data], "Current End Date") )

Column.Name: Contract RecordIDs
Column.Formula: IF( ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) == "Contract", ARRAY([Contract RecordID]), [Contract RecordIDs] )

Column.Name: Vary Contract RecordID
Column.Formula: IF( ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) == "Contract", [Contract RecordID], [Vary Contract RecordID]#[LineNumber] )

Column.Name: Source RecordID
Column.Formula: ARRAY_LAST([Source Record])

Column.Name: Source EFormType
Column.Formula: ARRAY_FIRST([Source Record])

Column.Name: Value of Variations to Date
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Potential Variation Value")

Column.Name: Variations to Date Percentage of Initial Contract Value Incl. Tax
Column.Formula: IFERROR([Value of Variations to Date] / [Original Contract Value] * 100, 0)

Pipe.ColumnName: Cumulative Variation to Date Plus This Variation

Column.Name: Previous Variations to Date
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Approved Variation Value")

Column.Name: Previous Variations to Date inc Tax
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Approved Variation Value") + HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Approved Tax")

Column.Name: Variation Value inc Tax
Column.Formula: [Variation Value] + [Tax]

Column.Name: Value of Variations to Date inc Tax
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Potential Variation Value") + HASH_GET([Variation Data], "Total Potential Tax")

Column.Name: New Contract Value inc Tax
Previous Variations to Date Percent
Column.Formula: IFERROR([Previous Variations to Date] / [Original Contract Value] * 100, 0)

Column.Name: Variation Value Percent
Column.Formula: IFERROR([Variation Value] / [Original Contract Value] * 100, 0)

Column.Name: Type Description
Column.Formula:
IF( AND( [Variation to Price] = TRUE, [Variation to Date] = TRUE, [Variation to Terms] = TRUE ), "Duration, Terms, Value",
AND( [Variation to Price] = TRUE, [Variation to Date] = TRUE, ), "Duration, Value",
AND( [Variation to Terms] = TRUE, [Variation to Date] = TRUE, ), "Duration, Terms",
AND( [Variation to Terms] = TRUE, [Variation to Price] = TRUE, ), "Value, Terms",
[Variation to Price] = TRUE, "Value",
[Variation to Terms] = TRUE, "Terms",
[Variation to Date] = TRUE, "Duration" )

Column.Name: Value Description
Submit Check
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( [Pending Submission] == TRUE, "Submission is already in progress",
[Status] == "Approved", "Variation is already Approved" )

Column.Name: Variation Read Only
Column.Formula: OR( [Status] = "Approved", [Pending Submission] == TRUE //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted )

Column.Name: Tax Percentage
Column.Formula:
LET $tax:= [Tax Percent];
RETURN 1 + $tax / 100

Column.Name: Approval Validation Conflict
Approval Not Required
Submission Round
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Submission Round], [Submission Count])

Column.Name: Pending Draft Submission
Column.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Submission", "[Status] = 'Draft'", HASH("parent", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID)) )>0

Column.Name: Tax Percent
Column.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Value", IF([Variation Value] = 0, 0, [Tax] / [Variation Value] * 100),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax Percent] )

Column.Name: Tax Mode
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Tax Mode], "Not Applicable")

Column.Name: Tax
Column.Formula:
IF( [Tax Mode] = "Percentage", IF([Tax Percent] = 0, 0, [Variation Value] / 100 * [Tax Percent]),
[Tax Mode] = "Not Applicable", 0,
[Tax] )

Column.Name: Extension Data
Parent Structure
Parent Chain
Column.Formula: HASH_GET([Parent Structure], "Parent Chain")

Column.Name: Temp End Date After Exercised
Temp End Date Before Exercised
Contract Data

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1
[RecordID] IN ARRAY ([Local].[Contract RecordIDs])

Binding.Expression:
LET $values := ARRAY( "Details", "Related Variations", "Attachments" );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT($values, $(i,item) HASH("value", $item, "text", ""))

"
"
OR( [Source Variation RecordID] <> NULL(), [Source Request for Information RecordID] <> NULL(), [Source Work Order RecordID] <> NULL() )

Label.Text: Description or summary of why the change is required
Implication to the timing of the project or contract
Summary of any risk associated with the variation
Detail any recommendation in addition to the variation

CheckBox.Text: Variation to contract terms and conditions

Label.Text: Select the type(s) of variation to the contract

CheckBox.Text: Variation to contract terms and conditions

Label.Text: Select the type(s) of variation to the contract

FieldEntry.Formula: [Original Contract Value] + [Previous Variations to Date] + [Variation Value]

Label.Text: Enter the value of this variation excluding tax

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Select the type of tax applied

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Enter the tax amount applicable to this variation

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Tax Mode] = "Value", [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

"
"
NUMBERFORMAT([Previous Variations to Date inc Tax], "C")

Label.Text: Detail any funding implications resulting from the variation
Summarise any potential financial flow on effects that may result from this variation

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: Enter the details of each extension option, then press "Add Extension" to add it to the list of extension options. Once this variation is finalised, each extension option will be recorded against this contract
The end date of the contract before this extension option is exercised

Information.Text: If this is the first extension option, this is the end date of the contract as of this variation being created. Otherwise, this is the end date of the previous extension option

Binding.Expression: IF([Temp End Date Before Exercised] == NULL, "No contract end date", [Temp End Date Before Exercised])
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Specify whether this extension should be exercised upon variation approval

Information.Text: If yes, the extension will be applied to the contract, and the current end date on the contract will be updated to reflect the extension duration. If no is selected, the extension will be created as a draft against the contract, and will require separate approval

Text.String: Exercise this extension on variation approval
Do not exercise this extension option

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Specify the end date of the extension

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Enter the end date of the contract after this extension is exercised

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [End Date Mode] = "Date", [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Enter the extension duration in years, months, and days

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [End Date Mode] = "Duration", [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation Read Only] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Ensure all extension data is valid before adding extension option
Summary of all extension options to be raised from this variation

FieldEntry.Formula: GREATEST( [End Date After Exercised], [End Date After Exercised]#([LineNumber] - 1) )
IF( AND( [Extension Months] = 0, [Extension Years] = 0 ), ARRAY_INDEX([Temp], 3) - 1, ARRAY_INDEX([Temp], 3) )

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Information.Text: If yes, the extension will be applied to the contract, and the current end date on the contract will be updated to reflect the extension duration. If no is selected, the extension will be created as a draft against the contract, and will require separate approval
If this is the first extension option, this is the end date of the contract as of this variation being created. Otherwise, this is the end date of the previous extension option

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, OR( [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Variation to Terms] == TRUE ) )

"
"
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Status] <> "Approved", [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, OR( [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Variation to Terms] == TRUE ) )

Label.Text: Enter a reference number for approvals that happened outside of the system

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", OR( [Approval Reference Number] <> NULL, AND( [Submission Count] = 0, [Approval Not Required] == TRUE, [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, OR( [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Variation to Terms] == TRUE ) ) ) )

IF( [Pending Draft Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft "Prepare approval submission",
[Pending Submission] == TRUE, //checks if any child submission record is in draft or submitted "Check status and details",
[Submission Count] >=1, "Prepare approval resubmission",
"Prepare approval submission" )

AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Status] <> "Approved", OR( [Submission Count] > 0, AND( [Approve at Contract Level] <> TRUE, [Approval Not Required] <> TRUE, OR( [Variation to Date] == TRUE, [Variation to Price] == TRUE, [Variation to Terms] == TRUE ) ) ) )

Label.Text: Ensure all required data has been provided before activating/submitting for approval

Binding.Expression:
IF( [Approval Not Required] == TRUE, "Ensure all required data has been provided before activating variation",
"Ensure all required data has been provided before submitting for approval" )

TextCriterion.Text: [Type] = 'Variation'

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN '#900000'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN '#ffffff'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN '#ffff00'
ELSE '#efefef' END

CASE WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved (Final)' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Rejected' THEN 'white'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Cancelled' THEN '#b3b3b3'
WHEN [Status] = 'Approved' THEN '#0b732b'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Approved' THEN '#00a06d'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'In Progress' THEN 'black'
WHEN [Approver Decision] = 'Pending' THEN 'black'
ELSE 'black' END

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(1, [Submission Count]), $(i,item) HASH( "value", $item, "text", $item ) );
RETURN ARRAY_CONCAT( HASH("value", 0, "text", "All"), $set )

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Related Variations", [Parent is Head Agreement] <> TRUE )

TextCriterion.Text: [LineNumber] = 1

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Related Variations", [Parent is Head Agreement] == TRUE )

NumericTextBox.ReferencedDataColumn: Variations to Date Percentage of Initial Contract Value Incl. Tax
Value of Variations to Date inc Tax

Information.Text: All Variations including draft and submitted. Excludes this variation.

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record if not already given access WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] = [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CASE -- Check if the user is in one of these roles - they should always have read access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE -- Check the value of Restricted on the Contract - if not true, these users can access in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for this record WHEN ( STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND [To].[Status] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) ) ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- If Contract RecordID is not populated, fall back to allow Originator access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
-- Check if user is listed in role on parent record WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is a vendor account, and return if they are the vendor for this record and if vendor access is enabled WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( (STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 AND ( -- If enabled, check if user is a Contact for the vendor (STEP TO [Contact] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[Vendor RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
OR
-- Check if user is the primary account for the vendor (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0 ) )
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR GET_USER_POSITION(CURRENT_USER) = 'COO' OR GET_USER_POSITION(CURRENT_USER) = 'CPO' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
STEP TO CHILD [Submission] ON ( [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND [To].[Status] <> 'Draft' ) GET COUNT(1)>0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( 'Variations' IN ARRAY([To].[Enabled Vendor Actions]) AND [To].[Vendor Access Enabled] FAST_EQUAL_TO TRUE AND [Contract RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

AlternativeParentRecord.EFormType: ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_SELECTMANY( EACH [Count of Extensions], $(i, item) ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(0, $item), $(e, ext) "Contract" ) ), $count)
AlternativeParentRecord.RecordID: ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_SELECTMANY( EACH [Count of Extensions], $(i, item) ARRAY_SELECT( RANGE(0, $item), $(e, ext) [Vary Contract RecordID]#$i ) ), $count)

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $includeContractValue := DB_LOOKUP( "Include Contract Value for Variation Approval", "Settings - Contract", "[LineNumber] = 1 AND [RecordID] = 1" );
RETURN IF( $includeContractValue <> TRUE, [Variation Value], [New Contract Value] )

LET $prefix := IF( ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) = "Multiple Award Contract", "M" );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( [Contract RecordIDs], $(i, item) IF( [Variation to Price] = TRUE, HASH( "Vary Contract RecordID", [Vary Contract RecordID]#$i, "Variation Number", $prefix & [Variation Number], "Variation Value", [Variation Value]#$i, "Reason for Variation", [Reason for Variation] ), NULL() ) )
IF( [Variation to Date] == TRUE, ARRAY_LENGTH(HASH_GET([Extension Data], "Status")) )
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission Round")//this will be 0 for the first round of submission + 1
HASH_GET($eventargs, "Previous Submission RecordID") //it will be null for the first roundof submission

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Call: Link Next Round (on last submission)

Event.Name: Raise Subcontract Variation
Event.Description: NOT IN USE - for HA - Variation to Term Only

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUPALL( "RecordID", "Contract", "[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Status] = 'Active' ", HASH("parent", ARRAY("Contract", [Contract RecordID])) )

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: Variation raised and submitted for approval at subcontract level. {ARRAY_LENGTH([Variation RecordIDs])}
